DOC.brief_summary: To analyze the common allergens revealed by skin tests in adult atopic dermatitis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Common Allergens in Skin Tests for Adult Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.detailed_description: The allergens involved in atopic patients are widely existed in our environment. Traditionally, we use serum specific IgE, skin prick test or intradermal test to verify the possible causative allergens in patients with atopic dermatitis. This study will evaluate the correlation between serum specific IgE, skin prick test, intradermal test, and patch test for common allergens in adult patients with atopic dermatitis.
DOC.criteria: patients with atopic dermatitis (according to Hanifin and Rajka criteria) age older than 16 years old pregnancy
